(?:^|/)(?i)COPYRIGHT
(?:^|/)(?i)LICEN[CS]E
(?:^|/)package(?:-lock)\.json$
(?:^|/)vendor/
ignore$
\.lock$
\.min\.
\.mod$
\.svg$
^go\.sum$
^pkg/templates/all/all\.go$
^\.github/actions/spelling/
^\.github/workflows/spelling\.yml
